rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment discusses testing plans using neutral language.
The segment describes a plan ('will test'), which is Neutral for Q3.
Segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports testing plans but lacks explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a bare negation.
Describes a planned response measure/surveillance ('the department will test other flocks within a... zone') without active reassurance.
